findings.title: Activity (com. db. pwcc. dbmobile. activities. SplashScreenActivity) is not Protected. An intent-filter exists.
findings.description: A  Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Service (com. google. firebase. iid. FirebaseInstanceIdService) is not Protected. [android:exported=true]
findings.description: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: High Intent Priority (999) [android:priority]
findings.description: By setting an intent priority higher than another intent, the app effectively overrides other requests.
findings.recommendation: If possible, do not set higher priorities for specific intents in the manifest file.
